title: Mystery Gifting is Rigged
body:
>after getting Celestial Soraka in 790 skin

>Me:NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
whywhywhyamialive
Elk:The nanas are real
Me:i dont even want to click awesome
Elk:lel
Me:shes not even worth 2RP
Me:i feel so gipt
Elk:And yet she sells for 975
rito fix stor pls
Me:inb4 u get pulsefire ez or SGU
Elk:***My money is on cottontail teemo
because I hate teemo.***
Me:you want 790 or 490?
my moneys on 490 being good
Elk:I'm gonna lock in the 790 eddie
I still don't think 490 is wurf
because you can get things under 490 too
Me:$35 of RP added to account
or not
i put the wrong cvv in
like i always do
Elk:well done XD
Me:ok 790 coming right up
Me:cross your fingers
Me:NO WAY
NO FUCKING WAY
HAX
Elk:I LITERALLY DON'T UNDERSTAND
HOW DOES THIS HAPPEN?!
XD
I AM LAUGHING SO HARD RIGHT NOW

He had a 1/151 chance, 0.6% LESS THAN ONE PERCENT!

replies.body:
I honestly don't understand at all. OH!
I love when newbies jump on the "hate Teemo train" like you were even around when it was relevant, I'm laughing at how hard you're trying to fit in, yet your account is newer than mine and this is my 7th account, get rekt son.
I see why this is your 7th account, your other 6 must have been banned for toxicity.
Hating Teemo was always relevant until his shroom's AP ratio got butchered.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iBOzioAd,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2014-12-22T03:59:05.489+0000)
>
> I honestly don't understand at all. OH!
> I love when newbies jump on the "hate Teemo train" like you were even around when it was relevant, I'm laughing at how hard you're trying to fit in, yet your account is newer than mine and this is my 7th account, get rekt son.

lol calling mah boi a nooby? He has his reasons for hating teemo, none of this bandwagon %%%%.
You can only get a 520RP skin or higher with a 490RP Mystery Gift.

I once mystery gifted my friend after he tried Yasuo and he fed super hard.
I was like, "I bet its definitely not Yasuo", and it was Yasuo.

Also, first mystery gift I ever got...
An hour beforehand (in person) I was like "The only skin I really want is Traditional Karma."
AND IT WAS TRADITIONAL KARMA.

best thing I have seen all day.
My friend hates kayle and when we were doing secret santa mystery gifts he ended up getting a kayle skin. We kept trying and now he has all the kayle skins :3

I only ever get vayne skins, every time i get a mystery gift its vayne 

vayne is one of the only champs i never play

So it was a few weeks before christmas event and I was like "Can't wait to get Snowstorm Sivir and Slaybelle Kat" since they are 2 skins i wanted to get- self mystery gifting comes out for a short time- was like screw it time to mystery gift myself, first 2 mystery gifts: Snowstorm Sivir and Slaybelle kat.... my third skin was pre-void kassadin though :C Still happy that i got the 2 skins i wanted :D

Funny. I literally just got that same skin from a mystery gift too.

Is there like a "pool" of skins at certain times of the day that mystery gifts come from?
Just curious since the same thing happened before where I got mystery gifted Riot Nasus, then like 2 of my friends got it as well around the same time.
My friend and i swapped gifts and both got Ionia Yi.
My friend and I swapped gifts and both got legacy skins.
I can confirm that rito has used hax
